CHAT.comment: PACIFICARE HEALTH SYSTEMS, INC., ET AL., Petitioners v. JEFFREY BOOK, ET AL.,
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:02 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF WILLIAM E. GRAUER ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF JOE R. WHATLEY, JR. ON BEHALF [*23] OF THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF WILLIAM E. GRAUER ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 11:01 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
